description: Configuration information for a voucher export - there's only one of these for a given batchGroup

id.description: UUID of the configuration record - System generated if not specified

batchGroupId.description: UUID of the batch associated with this export configuration

enableScheduledExport.description: Whether or not to enable scheduled batch voucher exports

format.description: Desired format (MIME type) of the batch voucher

startTime.description: The time of day to trigger an export if enableDailyExport == true.  Format: HH:MM

uploadURI.description: URI batch vouchers should be uploaded to.  Limited to FTP initially

sunday.description: Whether or not a batch voucher export should be triggered at startTime on this day of the week

monday.description: Whether or not a batch voucher export should be triggered at startTime on this day of the week

tuesday.description: Whether or not a batch voucher export should be triggered at startTime on this day of the week
